Scourge of the Fallen

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Deva, good or lawful good alignment
Benefit: When using memory of a thousand lifetimes to modify an attack roll against an evil immortal creature, you can also add the result to your damage roll.

Published in Dragon Magazine 374, page(s) 50.
